title: Trump compares his impeachment to Clinton email server
text:
President Trump Donald John TrumpGordon Sondland expected to appear for House deposition Ivanka Trump on impeachment: 'Everything's a question of priorities' Second intel official considering filing complaint over Trump: report MORE compared his impeachment inquiry to former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton Hillary Diane Rodham ClintonWarren campaign fires senior official after allegations of 'inappropriate behavior' GOP senator says he confronted Trump over Ukraine in August Whistleblowers and the hypocrisy of the ruling class MORE's email scandal Saturday afternoon.

"So Crooked Hillary Clinton can delete and acid wash 33,000 emails AFTER getting a Subpoena from the United States Congress, but I can’t make one totally appropriate telephone call to the President of Ukraine? Witch Hunt!" Trump tweeted.

So Crooked Hillary Clinton can delete and acid wash 33,000 emails AFTER getting a Subpoena from the United States Congress, but I can’t make one totally appropriate telephone call to the President of Ukraine? Witch Hunt! — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) October 5, 2019

The phone call Trump referenced was the subject of the whistleblower complaint that was the catalyst for House Democrats launching an official impeachment inquiry two weeks ago.

On Friday, the House Oversight and Reform Committee subpoenaed the White House for documents concerning Trump's July 25 phone call with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky.

House panels also asked Vice President Pence to turn over all documents he had concerning the phone call.

Saturday afternoon's tweet continued Trump's busy day on Twitter.
description: President Trump compared his impeachment inquiry to former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton's email scandal Saturday afternoon.
